raw_title: REV. DR. VINCENT JOSEPH MARIUS PEIRIS
raw_body: It is with deep regret that we announce the demise of his Lordship Most REV. DR. VINCENT JOSEPH MARIUS PEIRIS, Auxiliary Bishop Emeritus of Colombo on Monday the 13th May 2024. He is the beloved son of the late Mr. Henry Vincent Peiris and the late Mrs.L.Eslin Peiris.
